DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY NEWSMAKERS
DOC.TEXT: John O ' Rourke has joined Golden West Enterprises Inc. in Costa Mesa as general_manager of its financial services division . He will oversee Golden West Auto Leasing , Golden West Equipment Leasing and Golden West Real_Estate . Before joining the company , O ' Rourke was director of operations of Budget Rent A Car of Southern California for more_than 18 years .
